categories: Cap Cool Daily Long Sleeve T-Shirt
description:
Go forth with the technical wizardry of Patagonia® fabrics. This super-lightweight material is the same used for grown-up base layers, but with fresher, brighter graphics. Great on its own at the beach or as a base layer in slightly cooler weather.Solid fabric: solids are 100% recycled polyester, heathers and cross-dyes are  50% recycled.UPF 50+ sun protectionHeiQ® Fresh treatment keeps it smelling fresh.Fair Trade Certified sewing.
